data.text: Imbirani Yehova mokondwera Inu olungama,
Mutamandeni Yehova ndi pangwe;
Muyimbireni nyimbo yatsopano;
Pakuti mawu a Yehova ndi olungama ndi owona;
Yehova amakonda chilungamo ndipo amaweruza molungama;
Ndi mawu a Yehova mayiko akumwamba anapangidwa,
Iye amasonkhanitsa pamodzi madzi a m始nyanja m始mitsuko;
Dziko lonse lapansi liope Yehova;
Pakuti Iye anayankhula ndipo zinakhalapo;
Yehova amalepheretsa chikonzero cha anthu a mitundu ina;
Koma chikonzero cha Yehova chimakhala mpaka muyaya,
Wodala mtundu wa anthu umene Mulungu wake ndi Yehova,
Kuchokera kumwamba Yehova amayang始ana pansi
kuchokera ku malo ake okhalako Iye amayang始anira
Iye amene amapanga mitima ya onse,
Palibe mfumu imene imapulumutsidwa chifukwa cha kukula kwa gulu lake lankhondo;
Kavalo ndi chiyembekezo cha chabechabe cha chipulumutso,
Koma maso a Yehova ali pa iwo amene amaopa Iye;
kuwawombola iwo ku imfa
Ife timadikira kwa Yehova mwachiyembekezo;
Mwa Iye mitima yathu imakondwera,
Chikondi chanu chosatha
